```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(gridabm)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
forest <- create_forest(20, 0.8)
forest_results <- forest_fire_game(forest, 100)
animate_model_run(forest_results, 5, c("white", "green", "red", "firebrick"))
```


```{r, echo=TRUE}
life_board <- matrix(
  sample(c(0, 1), prob = c(0.8, 0.2), replace = TRUE, size = 625),
  nrow = 25, ncol = 25
)
life_results <- life_game(life_board, 100)
animate_model_run(life_results, 4, c("white", "black"))
```


```{r, echo=TRUE}
schelling_board <- matrix(
  sample(c(0, 1, 2), prob = c(0.1, 0.45, 0.45), replace = TRUE, size = 400),
  nrow = 20, ncol = 20
)
schelling_results <- schelling_game(schelling_board, 3, 100)
animate_model_run(schelling_results, 5, c("white", "orange", "blue"))
```


```{r, echo=TRUE}
brians_brain_board <- matrix(
  sample(c(0, 1, 2), prob = c(0.5, 0.25, 0.25), replace = TRUE, size = 1600),
  nrow = 40, ncol = 40
)
brians_brain_results <- brians_brain_game(brians_brain_board, 100)
animate_model_run(brians_brain_results, 1, c("black", "white", "blue")) +
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "black"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "black")
  )
```
